Cutting-Edge Cognitive Vision and Video Analytics Solutions for Canadian Businesses

About Us

Canny Vision is a Canadian startup delivering customizable AI solutions in motion detection, object classification, behavior tracking, incident detection, and traffic monitoring. With a strong commitment to quality, privacy, and security, our team of experts harnesses the latest advancements in Cognitive Vision and Video Analytics to provide reliable, scalable solutions across key industries.

Focused exclusively on the Canadian market, Canny Vision stands at the forefront of video analytics technology, helping organizations elevate their security, efficiency, and intelligence.

Our Product

Customizable, Cutting-Edge Solutions Quality, Privacy, and Security Each solution is designed to integrate seamlessly into your existing infrastructure and tailored to meet the specific needs of your organization.

We prioritize data privacy and security, ensuring all solutions comply with Canadian standards and regulations.

Industries

Our solutions are tailored to meet the unique needs of diverse sectors, ensuring that each industry benefits from our specialized approach to video analytics:

Government and Defense

Strengthen public safety, secure sensitive facilities, and enhance surveillance capabilities with AI-powered solutions designed for high-security environments.

Retail

Improve store security, understand customer behavior, and drive operational efficiency with real-time insights and advanced analytics

Transportation and Logistics

Monitor traffic flow, ensure road safety, and optimize logistical operations with datadriven traffic management and incident detection.
